page.title: 12Children's interests - 1985.
page.content: "I like riding my B.M.X. bike fast round the corners of the farm yard.Then I pull a skid and do wheelies." "In winter we like to sledge on till bags, build snowmen and have snow- ball fights.I watch T.V.,read my books or play on our Commodore 16 Computer." "I run in the field with the cat, hide and make dens in the trees." "I have a Suzuki ts 100cc and my friend has a Yamaha 100cc. We have a big scramble course on the moor with two jumps,one after another. They are at about 60 degrees." "I play football and cricket and enjoy scrapping with my brothers." "I train for my cross country running. At home I play snooker." "Monday - swimming, Tuesday - Brownies, Wednesday, Friday, Sunday - dancing." *** WHAT A BUSY LIFE! ***
